name: What would you like to have today?
summary:
You walk into the kitchen, sleepy. With morning breath on your mouth, you yawn widely. Shuffling over to the window, you yank the blinds up, a flutter of dust around you. You notice the chill seeping through the window cracks and decide on having something warm. You glance at the clock on your phone and there's plenty of time to make a cup to wash down the sleepiness.

A very basic game where you choose what you would like to drink this morning.
